attributes.review: i was trying to count my strawberries when this app popped up on my phone. when i went to delete it, a message appeared saying “mustn’t delete. he will kill you. watch out” so i unlocked my doors just in case he was already coming. then one of my strawberries leaped away and out the door and came back with a mini knife. wish i could give zero stars just because this app almost killed me..
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: This app is the worst possible app! It’s slow, it’s fake, and worst of all it’s basically useless. It doesn't Yelp you trump anything I don’t know what the point of this app is! Last thing I can say is don’t download this app!
